name: Jelly Shooter
description:
Title: Jelly Shooter

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: FPS 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: A short, 2 level game where you must dodge enemies and obstacles in order to reach the end portal. Try to collect all the coins, hope you can keep up!

Instructions: Move with WASD, left-click to shoot. Don't get hit by the enemushrooms or stuck behind a rock.

Game Design Team: Samantha Parton – Game Designer

Audio: EpidemicSound.com
